title: Fossil hunters find tracks of animals from about 3 million years ago – a first in South Africa
description: These tracksites appear to contain the first recorded Pliocene vertebrate tracks described from southern Africa.

title: Podcast: The ancient, ‘juicy’ origins of antibiotic resistance
description: Hosts David and Gina endure environmental extremes to understand how resistance emerged—and how we’re fighting it

title: Free climbers discover remnants of ancient sea turtle stampede in Italy - Phys.org
description: Free climbers discover remnants of ancient sea turtle stampede in Italy Phys.org

title: Satellite Images Show Dramatic Revival of Ancient African City
description: From above, Benin City in southern Nigeria tells a striking story as forests and farmland give way to sprawling neighborhoods, laterite roads and industrial zones.In just four decades, the city has swelled, growing from about 350,000 residents in 1980 to more than 2 million today—making it one of...

title: Multilateralism works even as US and fossil fuel industry oppose climate action, UN chief says
description: New YORK, Dec 3 - The final outcome of the COP30 climate summit in Brazil last month was \"disappointing,\" but showed multilateralism still works in the absence of the United States' participation and amid growing geopolitical tensions, UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres told the Reuters NEXT conference in New York on Wednesday.
